channel.title: xEnt's Map Editor Tutorial
channel.description:
[u][b]Working Map Editor[/b][/u] - http://uppit.com/41QVTR
[u][b]How to use:[/b][/u]
1: Double click the run.bat 2: On right hand side, Click ''load landscape'' 3: Browse your client folder, and load the Landscape.rscd 4: Select location, Default is h0x50y50. (lumbridge, castle, general store, etc is in view here) 5: Select which landscape objects you would like to use, and click them on the map as u wish, basically like using paint. 6: Now when finished, click ''save landscape'' and this will save in your C:/ by default. 7: Now find your landscape.rscd again, Right click and open with winrar, Then get the h0x50y50 file that you have just saved into your C:/ and drag it into the winrar window, Click ok, and close winrar. 8: Now load your client, login and your new landscapes should be there.
[u][b]PICS TUT[/b][/u]
[u][b]1: Load your landscape.rscd[/b][/u]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/8024/55402217tr2.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img217/55402217tr2.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/55402217tr2.jpg/1/w1024.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b] 2: Choose Location.[/b][/u]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/7743/70479849dx3.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img222/70479849dx3.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/70479849dx3.jpg/1/w1024.png[/img][/URL] [u][b] 3: Draw your landscapes on map, as you please.[/b][/u]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/4994/45695387pi9.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img227/45695387pi9.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/45695387pi9.jpg/1/w1024.png[/img][/URL] [u][b] 4: Save fil to C:/[/b][/u]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/3613/94281289dv2.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img222/94281289dv2.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/94281289dv2.jpg/1/w1024.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b]5: Opening the landscape.rscd with winrar.[/b][/u]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/166/73746849sn8.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img225/73746849sn8.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/73746849sn8.jpg/1/w1027.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b]6: Draggin the new landscape file from C:/ to winrar window[/b][/u].
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/3631/14339633mb6.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img225/14339633mb6.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/14339633mb6.jpg/1/w1027.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b]
Example of working results.[/b][/u] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img354.imageshack.us/img354/8678/62869003db6.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img354/62869003db6.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img354.imageshack.us/img354/62869003db6.jpg/1/w510.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b]Update - Few co-ords to help people.[/b][/u]
[b]52 46 = edge 53 44 = wilderness castle 53 42 = chaos dwarfs cliff 54 41 = 37 prayer hut 54 39 = p2p wild agility course 53 39 = pirate hut, stairway to giants 52 39 = mage arena, bank. 51 39 = axe hut, teleport lever from aldy to wild 51 40 = the old rsc hut in wild, with gem & spiders. 52 40 = eastside of black knights maze 53 40 = westside of black knights maze[/b]
<3 for xEnt for opening this to the public.

Server + client side = Success
